articles.author: Jem Aswad
articles.title: Scooter Braun Steps Down as CEO of HYBE America - Variety
articles.description: Scooter Braun will step down from his role as CEO of HYBE America and will move into a consulting role.
articles.content:
Scooter Braun will step down from his role as CEO of HYBE America and move into a consulting role, the company announced Tuesday.
The executive and entrepreneur will be transitioning into an executi… [+4297 chars]
